titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the New beginnings [videorecording] : the story of the Islamic Center of America / a film by Raad Alawan and Live Camera Productions.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: New beginnings [videorecording] : the story of the Islamic Center of America / a film by Raad Alawan and Live Camera Productions.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Dearborn, Mich. : Islamic Center of America, 2005.

archdesc.scopecontent: The documentary chronicles a journey of faith and sacrifice that began in 1949 as members of the Muslim community struggled to preserve their religious heritage in Southeast Michigan.
